title: Chambeali - Luke (Book)
description: Chambeali translation of the Gospel of Luke. The Chambeali language is a part of the North-Western branch of the Indo-Aryan languages. It is further classified as a member of the Western-Pahari group.

language.name: Chambeali
language.area: Himachal Pradesh, Chamba District, Chamba Tahsil; Jammu and Kashmir.
